xuiSpinner
directive in module xui

Description

Spinning element.

Usage

as element:
<xui-spinner
       show="{boolean}"
       size="{number}"
       delay="{number}">
</xui-spinner>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
showboolean

If the spinner should be shown or not.

sizenumber

Width and height of the spinner in pixels. Currently, only 20, 32, and 64 are supported.

(default: 20)

delaynumber

How long (in ms) the spinner will wait to display after show is set.

(default: 250)

Example

Source
